channel.title: Awesome-indie – Resources to help independent developers make money
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I just curated a list of resources to help indie developers bootstrap project ideas and make money. It's an 'awesome' list like those on github.
https://github.com/mezod/awesome-indie
Let me know if it's helpful and feel free to contribute, especially in the last section, where I'd like to cover more specific topics.
Cheers!

item.title: Awesome-indie – Resources to help independent developers make money
item.dc:creator: dgrigg
item.description:
Nice list, lots of good links

Read full topic
item.source: Awesome-indie – Resources to help independent developers make money
